com.soa.console.binding

Class AccessPointContextLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.console.binding.AccessPointContextLoader

  • public class AccessPointContextLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The AccessPointContextLoader is used to retrieve and set access point context from the servlet request context.
    Since:
    6.0
